title: Absolute ball sack
review: Don't waste money or time. Had to go through the process of making a account to warn how bad this movie is

title: Where's the rest of it?
review:
Felt like it was building to something but just ended. Just another exorcism movie, but this one had the potential to be one of the good ones. Story, acting, effects were all great but the lack of a decent ending made it a frustrating disappointment.

Also wayyyyyy to short, run time wise.

My advice,

Skip it.

title: Laughable
review: Every cliche imaginable combined with the worst acting in years. Cannot understand how this got made.
